reviewText: Easy to learn with this video.
The video was great and came very quickly!! Good job!!
Great DVD I will recommend to others.

I ordered this DVD to show my husband how to do the turns with the arms. I landed on my foot wrong NOT dancing getting out of my truck, so I'm on some down time . Watched the DVD can't wait to dance with my husband for the first time.
I am totally satisfaced  whit this purchase.  Excellent product, excellent service.  It was what I wanted and expected about the overall purchase.

Muy buen DVD.  Todos los datos en espanol.  Ensena paso a paso, como bailar cumbia en cada detalle.  Ejemplos para el baron y hembra y pareja.  Nunca habia visto un DVD de cumbia y este salio muy bueno... hace que la cumbia sea facil... se lo recomiendo.

This DVD (it is in Spanish) but you can follow along without understand what they are saying, is an excellent for of showing how to dance cumbia.  Step by step, this DVD shows details and reviews for both male and female and then as a couple.  I am also impressed, because I have never seen a cumbia DVD  and it this is really good... it makes dancing cumbias simple.
